content: Palestones, like Pitstones, are durable bulky enemies who will try to spin and bash into you with their sharp quartz shells to deal a lot of damage. Even worse, they’ll shake violently to shoot quartz projectiles out around them, and then target you even at a distance. Luckily, a charged hardy smack can severely wound them, so keep your distance and strafe until charged to cut them down to size.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fright_Cliff_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Fright Cliff Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Squall Hideout' and the sub-subsection 'The First Buddha’s Eyeball'.
The content is as follows:
Palestones, like Pitstones, are durable bulky enemies who will try to spin and bash into you with their sharp quartz shells to deal a lot of damage. Even worse, they’ll shake violently to shoot quartz projectiles out around them, and then target you even at a distance. Luckily, a charged hardy smack can severely wound them, so keep your distance and strafe until charged to cut them down to size.
